name: Stormterror's Lair
title: Stormterror's Lair
desc: The ambitious dream was built proudly upon the capital of the God of Storms, and collapsed to ruin under the lofty song of freedom.
in_play_description: When you play a Talent card, or when your character uses a Skill with an original cost of at least 4 Elemental Dice: Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round) Usage(s): 3

skills.desc: When played: Draw 1 random Talent card from your deck. When you play a Talent card, or when your character uses a Skill with an original cost of at least 4 Elemental Dice: Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round) Usage(s): 3
